item.title: BARBITURATES Ultra-short acting barbiturates include Brietal and Pentothal
item.description: BARBITURATES BARBITURATES are sedative drug.. used, among other purposes, to relieve anxiety and to promote sleep.

item.title: Risk of Antibiotics (Risk of Allergies)
item.description: hypersensitive reactions Giving antibiotics to babies may increase their threat for developing hypersensitive reactions, a new take a look at suggests.

item.title: Types of antimicrobial agents And what is Antibiotics
item.description: Types of antimicrobial agents Piperacillin/tazobactam Vaccinations Immunoglobulins Cephalosporins Gentamycin Co-amoxiclav Human Albumin Xylocaine/adrenaline Remifentanil 10.

item.title: what is BARBER'S ITCH, or sycosis barbae,
item.description: BARBER'S ITCH, or sycosis barbae, is the name applied to a troublesome condi-tion which affects the beard area in men.
